## About Me

My name is **Dermot Curtin** and I am a recent graduate of the College of William and Mary currently working as a content editor at catalyst.cm.

## About the Project

*The Efficiency Program* interrogates the relationship between the weight and fuel efficiency of motor vehicles. The two variables have an inverse correlation.

### Goals

-   Determine the causes of increases in fuel efficiency over time

    -   +Data is four decades out of date

-   Achieve space flight
